location.zh-cn: 中国大陆北京市人民大会堂东大厅
location.en: East Hall, Great Hall of the People, Beijing, Mainland China

description.zh-cn: 指于2024年4月10日，时任中共中央总书记习近平与中华民国前总统马英九两人在北京人民大会堂举行的会面。这是两人继2015年后的第二次会面，也是两岸历任领导人首次在一方实控领土上举行的会面。
description.en: Refers to the meeting held on April 10, 2024, between Xi Jinping, then General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, and Ma Ying-jeou, former President of the Republic of China, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing. It was the second meeting between the two after 2015 and the first meeting between current or former leaders from both sides of the strait to be held on territory controlled by one of the parties.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统、中国国民党前主席。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China and former Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常委、全国政协主席，参与了习马二会。
description.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CCP Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the CPPCC, participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常委、中共中央书记处书记、中共中央办公厅主任，参与了习马二会。
description.en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CCP Central Committee, Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat, and Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee, participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央台办主任，参与了习马二会。
description.en: Director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the CCP Central Committee, participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 马英九文教基金会执行长，陪同马英九参与习马二会。
description.en: Executive Director of the Ma Ying-jeou Foundation, accompanied Ma Ying-jeou to the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由马英九成立的基金会，组织了马英九对中国大陆的访问。
description.en: A foundation established by Ma Ying-jeou, which organized his visit to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 2015年习近平与马英九在新加坡举行的首次会面，被视为海峡两岸关系发展的重大突破。
description.en: The first meeting between Xi Jinping and Ma Ying-jeou held in Singapore in 2015, regarded as a major breakthrough in the development of cross-strait relations.

description.zh-cn: 马英九于2024年4月对中国大陆的第二次访问，习马二会是该行程的最后一项活动。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou's second visit to mainland China in April 2024. The Second Ma-Xi Meeting was the final event of this trip.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府处理海峡两岸事务的专责行政机关。
description.en: The dedicated administrative agency of the Republic of China government for handling cross-strait affairs.

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府的外交主管机关。
description.en: The foreign affairs authority of the Republic of China government.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，2024年习马二会时的执政党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, and the ruling party at the time of the Second Ma-Xi Meeting in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党主席，对习马二会表达祝福。
description.en: Then-Chairman of the Kuomintang, who expressed his blessings for the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，马英九曾任该党主席。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, of which Ma Ying-jeou is a former chairman.

description.zh-cn: 台湾民众党主席，对习马二会给予肯定，但对“九二共识”持保留意见。
description.en: Chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, who affirmed the Second Ma-Xi Meeting but expressed reservations about the '1992 Consensus'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党之一，对习马二会持批评态度。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan that was critical of the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的主要负责人，也是中国共产党的最高领导人。
description.en: The head of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the highest-ranking official within the Communist Party of China.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在北京人民大会堂东大厅举行第二次会面，即“习马二会”，讨论两岸关系。此次会面为马英九二访中国大陆的最后一项行程。
description.en: Held their second meeting, the 'Second Ma-Xi Meeting', in the East Hall of the Great Hall of the People in Beijing to discuss cross-strait relations. This meeting was the final event of Ma Ying-jeou's second visit to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 作为中方代表之一参加了习马二会，并在会后于钓鱼台国宾馆设宴为马英九饯行。
description.en: Participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting as one of the Chinese representatives and hosted a farewell banquet for Ma Ying-jeou at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse after the meeting.

description.zh-cn: 作为中方代表之一参加了习马二会。
description.en: Participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting as one of the Chinese representatives.

description.zh-cn: 作为中方代表之一参加了习马二会。
description.en: Participated in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting as one of the Chinese representatives.

description.zh-cn: 陪同马英九参与习马二会。
description.en: Accompanied Ma Ying-jeou to participate in the Second Ma-Xi Meeting.

description.zh-cn: 习近平自2012年起担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Xi Jinping has served as General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee since 2012.

description.zh-cn: 马英九曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou previously served as President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 马英九曾任中国国民党主席。
description.en: Ma Ying-jeou previously served as Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 萧旭岑担任马英九文教基金会执行长。
description.en: Hsiao Hsu-tsen serves as the Executive Director of the Ma Ying-jeou Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 2015年的首次“习马会”为2024年的第二次会面奠定了基础和先例。
description.en: The first 'Ma-Xi Meeting' in 2015 laid the foundation and set a precedent for the second meeting in 2024.

description.zh-cn: “习马二会”是马英九第二次访问中国大陆行程中的一项核心活动。
description.en: The 'Second Ma-Xi Meeting' was a core event during Ma Ying-jeou's second visit to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 发布新闻稿，认为中共借机宣传其政治主张，并对马英九未能公开传达台湾人民捍卫主权的坚持表示遗憾。
description.en: Issued a press release, stating that the CCP used the opportunity to promote its political agenda and expressing regret that Ma Ying-jeou failed to publicly convey the Taiwanese people's insistence on defending their sovereignty.

description.zh-cn: 发布新闻稿，呼吁北京正视台湾主流民意，并指出台湾民众在意的是中国的军事恫吓而非无法代表台湾主流民意的论述。
description.en: Issued a press release urging Beijing to face Taiwan's mainstream public opinion and pointing out that the Taiwanese people are concerned about China's military intimidation rather than narratives that do not represent Taiwan's mainstream opinion.

description.zh-cn: 表示马英九无法代表台湾人民，并批评其论述落入中方设定的一中框架。
description.en: Stated that Ma Ying-jeou could not represent the Taiwanese people and criticized his discourse for falling into the 'one China' framework set by Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 批评马英九在解放军机舰扰台时与习近平会面，沦为中国大陆促统的“马前卒”。
description.en: Criticized Ma Ying-jeou for meeting with Xi Jinping while PLA military aircraft and vessels were active around Taiwan, calling him a 'pawn' for China's unification promotion.

description.zh-cn: 作为国民党主席，对会面表达祝福，认为这是推动两岸和平交流非常重要的一步。
description.en: As the Chairman of the KMT, expressed blessings for the meeting, believing it to be a very important step in promoting peaceful cross-strait exchanges.

description.zh-cn: 国民党立法院党团发布新闻稿，认为会面打破两岸僵局，是重启和平交流的重要一步。
description.en: The KMT's legislative caucus issued a press release, stating that the meeting broke the cross-strait stalemate and was an important step towards restarting peaceful exchanges.

description.zh-cn: 肯定马英九为和平努力的个人行为，但对其“坚持九二共识”的立场表示未获台湾主流民意认同。
description.en: Acknowledged Ma Ying-jeou's personal efforts for peace but stated that his stance on 'upholding the 1992 Consensus' was not supported by Taiwan's mainstream public opinion.

description.zh-cn: 表示鼓励降低紧张局势和改善两岸关系的步骤，支持在尊严与尊重的基础上持续对话。
description.en: Stated that it encourages steps to de-escalate tensions and improve cross-strait relations, and supports continued dialogue on the basis of dignity and respect.
